column4: Hello Ubuntu community, I'm trying to get my acer aspire 5516 laptop working smoothly with Ubuntu, one problem I am having is that my wireless button on my laptop does not work when I boot into ubuntu, can anyone help me solve this headache?  I think I am using the broadcom chipset
Can anyone help me with a faulty wireless switch?
koshari- what is the easiest thing for a new ubuntu user to do to resolve this problem?
